documentation:
--- modus-badge-storybook-docs.mdx --- import { Anchor } from '@storybook/addon-docs'; # Badge --- [Modus Badge](https://modus.trimble.com/components/web/badges/) web components provide non-interactive labels for displaying small amounts of information. They are referenced using the `` custom HTML element. This component utilizes the slot element, allowing you to render your own HTML in the badge. ### Default Primary Secondary Tertiary High Contrast Success Warning Danger Small Medium Large ### Counter 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 sm md lg ### Text Primary Secondary High Contrast Success Danger Small Medium Large ```html Default Secondary Tertiary Dark Warning Danger Small Medium Large Counter Counter Counter Counter Counter Counter Small Medium Large Primary Secondary High Contrast Success Danger Small Medium Large ``` ### Properties
Name Description Type Options Default Value Required
aria-label The badge's aria-label string
color The color of the badge string 'danger', 'dark', 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'tertiary', 'warning' 'primary'
size The size of the badge string 'small', 'medium', 'large' 'medium'
type The type of the badge string 'counter', 'default', 'text' 'default'
### Accessibility - Badge has `role` of `status`. - Badge gets an `aria-label` provided by the `aria-label` property input.
